channel.title: Veldars - 317- Unique - Fresh Eco - Daily Bonuses
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://veldars.com/bin/images/banner.png[/img]
[SIZE=3]Website - [URL=http://"http://veldars.com"]http://veldars.com[/URL][/SIZE] [SIZE=3]Forums - [URL=http://"http://veldars.com/forum/"]http://veldars.com/forum/[/URL][/SIZE]
[SIZE=2]What is Veldars? From the creators of 06Prime we represent Veldars. Veldars is a RSPS made to be advanced and unique Free to play Runescape Private Server in the industry. We have plans that's going make the server flawless and full of content with help from our experienced developers from the main server. Veldars - The Game, the 2nd world for the War of Fremennik which means that this isn't going to be the main world of Veldars but there's going to be 2 worlds, 1 for the main game with Eco and 2 for War of Fremennik.[/SIZE]
[SIZE=3][U]Features[/U][/SIZE]
Queen Black Dragon 15 Bosses 8 Mini-games Duel arena Tons of Dungeons Dwarf Multicannon Achievements Social Slayer (Duo Slayer) Daily Updates Fully functional bank tabs Complete clan chat system Flawless combat 23 working skills! Customizable Client 667 maps Gambling (Dicing and flowers) Money pouch with unlimited storage 100% Clans with real interfaces Real rock caverns with rocktail fishing Highscores Shooting stars Evil trees Great community
[U][SIZE=3]Media[/SIZE][/U]

This actually looks unique, this is a 317? loading whatever? this looks like a 562 I dont think i have seen something such as this before lol. I might check this out if i get a chance other than that, good luck!

Also fix the links !

[SIZE=2]What is Veldars?
From the creators of 06Prime we represent Veldars. Veldars is a RSPS made to be advanced and unique Free to play Runescape Private Server in the industry. We have plans that’s going make the server flawless and full of content with help from our experienced developers from the main server. Veldars - The Game, the 2nd world for the War of Fremennik which means that this isn’t going to be the main world of Veldars but there’s going to be 2 worlds, 1 for the main game with Eco and 2 for War of Fremennik.[/SIZE]
